outputs.output_descr:
The objective of the project is to provide young Palestinian youth and children (boys & girls) between the ages of 5 & 18 with a venue to develop their athletic and team sport skills while simultaneously promoting their emotional & physical well-being.

 The project includes the construction of an indoor Sports Facility in Ramallah and the establishment of the Palestinian Youth Sports League (PYSL)

project_descr: Supporting Programme Opportunities in Recreational and Team Sports (SPORTS). The project includes the construction of an indoor Sports Facility in Ramallah and the establishment of the Palestinian Youth Sports League (PYSL)
